item.title: November 6-8, 2015 - Women's Flat Track Derby Association
item.description:
November 6-8, 2015 - Women's Flat Track Derby Association

Everything you need to know about the 2015 International WFTDA Championships in Saint Paul, Minnesota, November 6-8, 2015.

item.title: It was a hard-fought game against Denver but the @bayareaderbygirls advance to play the @rcrallstars in the next round at the @wftda Championship in Saint Paul. #wftda #wftdachamps #bayareaderbygirls #staygold #rollerderby
item.description: It was a hard-fought game against Denver but the @bayareaderbygirls advance to play the @rcrallstars in the next round at the @wftda Championship in Saint Paul. #wftda #wftdachamps #bayareaderbygirls #staygold #rollerderby

item.title: THE SWARM HAS ARRIVED!! Our All Stars are waiting for #wftdachamps registration and looking on point in their @rollline_rollerderby jerseys. HARD. SMART. TOGETHER. #gothamgirls #rollerderby #wftda #iamwftda #killerbees #hivemind #fivemind

item.title: 2015 International WFTDA Playoffs and Championships
item.description:
2015 International WFTDA Playoffs and Championships

The 2015 International WFTDA Playoffs and Championships kick off in August! Visit http://wftda.com/tournaments for information about all of the tournaments.
